name: Deeper (Soulcube)
description:
Here's what we made in a uh few hours cos nobody was doing Ludum Dare in our community lmfao. We ran into a bunch of technical & communication issues due to neither of us actually planning on participating this LD but we hope you guys find something to enjoy. Cheers.
